name: Elemental Spirit
speed: walk 40 ft., fly 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., swim 40 ft.
languages: Primordial, understands the languages you speak
resist: lightning, thunder (air only), piercing; piercing, slashing (earth only); acid (water only)

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage
